container.startup: pip3 install --upgrade pip; if [[ -d .git ]] && [[ 1 == '1' ]]; then git pull; fi; if [[ ! -z {{PY_PACKAGES}} ]]; then pip install -U --target .local/lib/python3.8/site-packages {{PY_PACKAGES}}; fi; if [[ -f /home/container/${REQUIREMENTS_FILE} ]]; then pip install -U --target .local/lib/python3.8/site-packages -r ${REQUIREMENTS_FILE}; fi; /usr/local/bin/python /home/container/{{BOT_PY_FILE}}
